ghosts.name: Spirit of Shadows
ghosts.dialogue: Hey there, you lost soul. Itâ€™s dangerous around here. You must to find a key to get out of here.

ghosts.name: Evil Echo
ghosts.dialogue: Your footsteps echo through these empty halls, a prelude to your inevitable demise.

ghosts.name: Phantom
ghosts.dialogue: You'll join us in eternal darkness!

ghosts.name: Witch
ghosts.dialogue: The spirits of this house hunger for company, but they crave souls, not flesh.

ghosts.name: Demon
ghosts.dialogue: You dare to disturb the slumber of the damned? Prepare to face the consequences, mortal.
